original_text: Look at what happens! In the evening the enemy attacks, and we are very afraid. But by the morning they have disappeared! That is what happens to people who attack us. Anyone who tries to take away our valuable things for themselves will fail. Look at what happens! In the evening the enemy attacks, and we are very afraid. But by the morning they have disappeared! That is what happens to people who attack us. Anyone who tries to take away our valuable things for themselves will fail.
korean_text: 보라 저녁에 두려움을 당하고 아침이 오기 전에 그들이 없어졌나니 이는 우리를 노략한 자들의 몫이요 우리를 강탈한 자들의 보응이니라

sentences.original_text: In the evening the enemy attacks
But by the morning they have disappeared!
That is what happens to people who attack us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 우리를 공격하는 사람들에게 일어나는 일이다.

sentences.original_text: Anyone who tries to take away our valuable things for themselves will fail.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 귀중한 것을 자신들을 위해 빼앗으려는 사람들은 실패할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: In the evening the enemy attacks
But by the morning they have disappeared!
That is what happens to people who attack us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 우리를 공격하는 사람들에게 일어나는 일이다.

sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 귀중한 것을 자신들을 위해 빼앗으려는 사람들은 실패할 것이다.
